h3_title: Kang-Jin Star Boss Fight and Guide
content: Note that the field will also generate an electric ring along the ground to reach even farther that you'll need to jump or pillar stance over - but it also only moves along a flat horizontal axis, and standing on rocks or slope can often cause it to go under you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Kang-Jin_Star.md', within the main section titled 'Kang-Jin Star', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Kang-Jin Star' and the sub-subsection 'Kang-Jin Star Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Note that the field will also generate an electric ring along the ground to reach even farther that you'll need to jump or pillar stance over - but it also only moves along a flat horizontal axis, and standing on rocks or slope can often cause it to go under you.
